name: The Last Light
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You imbue the touched creature with a faint light. They shed dim light out to 5 feet. Each time the creature takes damage, they shed bright light out to 5 feet and dim light out another 5 feet, with both increasing by 5 feet each time they take damage.

If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, the light within explodes outwards, striking all creatures within the bright light that the target chooses. Each such creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they are blinded for 1 minute and take 10d10 radiant damage. On a success, they take half damage and are blinded until the start of the target's next turn.
